Name: Bolshoi Punch
Ingredients: 30 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: An innocuous-seeming pink classic - richly flavoured and easy to drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Bolshoi Punch contains 238 calories
